chromloop
  • Get Started
  • Reference

Add correlation of ChIP-seq coverage to motif pairs.

This function first adds ChIP-seq signals along all regions of motif location using the function addCovToGR. Than it calculates the correlation of coverage for each input pair using the function addCovCor. The Pearson correlation coeffiicent is added as new metadata column to the input interactions.

addCor(gi, bwFile, name = "chip", window = 1000, binSize = 1)

Arguments

gi

GInteractions object.
bwFile

File path or connection to BigWig file with ChIP-seq signals.
name

Character indicating the sample name.
window

the window size around the center of ranges in gr.
binSize

size of bins to which the coverage values are combined.

Contents

  • Arguments
